title: How important is Microsoft Project? - Quora

response.answer_text: this is a crazy open ended question as you have not qualified it - to me its (project) not important, its useless- i will never use it. not that i is bad- i just dont need it to you it may be the most important application you use.. how can any answer to this question be relevent to you if it is open ended why are you asking the question, do you want to use project? we could have a long two way discussion to fully answer the question but i cant do it one sided

Microsoft Project is a project management information system that is used for managing the project activities. This tool helps the project manager for scheduling the project activities and assigned the resources to the activities. It is also used to create a project calendar and resource calendar which is very important to the success of the project.
